name: Pinball Breaker VI
description:
Pinball Breaker VI is a brick breaking game which combines the game mechanics of a traditional brick breaker game and a flipper game.
Play through 15 exciting levels as you aim for a high score.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
